projects.name: RPA Farm | Xecuta
projects.description: RPA Farm is a software as a service (SaaS) that enables Robotic Process Automation (RPA) to its business clients as the most cost-effective RPA service on the market thanks to its pay-per-use pricing model at 1 millisecond granularity. The service is built as fully serverless on AWS cloud and can execute Robot Framework scripts that can be self-managed or Xecuta-managed. It provides APIs for single or multiple task execution on demand. As Chief Architect, I designed its business and operating model, designed and implemented its cloud architecture and wrote backend code in Node.JS and Python.

projects.name: Document Analysis Service | Xecuta
projects.description: Document Analysis Service is a software as a service (SaaS) that can extract text from documents and images. Unlike its counterparts, it aims to be the most cost-effective service on the market thanks to its pay-per-use pricing model at 1 page granularity. The service is built as fully serverless on AWS cloud and can integrate with Amazon Textract or Google Cloud DocumentAI for complex use cases that require Machine Learning or Generative AI. It provides APIs for single or multiple page processing on demand. As Chief Architect, I designed its business and operating model, designed and implemented its cloud architecture and wrote backend code in Node.JS and Python.
